BlitzBrowser provides a managed Docker environment for running headful browsers, simplifying deployment and scaling. It allows direct connection from automation frameworks like Puppeteer and Playwright, offering features like live viewing, persistent sessions via S3, and proxy support without requiring extensive DevOps knowledge.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

VibeNVR is a privacy-focused, local Network Video Recorder (NVR) system designed for efficient video surveillance. It offers a modern React-based interface, a custom high-performance video engine using Python, OpenCV, and FFmpeg, and features like smart motion detection, a unified event timeline, and secure authentication, all deployable via Docker.

ScreenCoder is an intelligent system that converts UI screenshots into production-ready HTML/CSS code. It utilizes a modular multi-agent architecture for visual understanding, layout planning, and adaptive code synthesis, enabling accurate and editable front-end code generation.
